Issue.creator: muralisr
Issue.summary: move system chaincodes from chaincode/ to system_chaincodes/
Issue.description: The refactor and cleanup of "ccprovider" package (core/common/ccprovider) paved way for further cleanup. As a first step let us move back all the system chaincode (lscc, vscc, cscc, qscc, escc) to be in their own packages under system_chaincodes.
